author: PDF
cleaned_text: 1 Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) for COVID -19 Vaccine Providers This running FAQ document will be updated weekly . Latest update: August 2 nd, 2021 Frequently Asked Questions Where to find the answer How do we register to be a COVID -19 vaccine provider, and where do we find training material for our staff to vaccinate? How to Enroll as a COVID -19 Vaccination Provider | CDC After we register to be a COVID -19 vaccine provider, when will we receive vaccine to start vaccinating? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid -19/training - education/resources.html Should a COVID -19 vaccine administered in the gluteal muscle instead of the deltoid muscle be repeated? COVID -19 Vaccine FAQs for Healthcare Professionals | CDC A nurse accidentally vaccinated a 16 -year -old with the Moderna COVID -19 vaccine. Should that patient receive the second dose? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid - 19/downloads/covid19 -vaccine -errors - deviations.pdf If a patient rec eived a higher than authorized volume dose, should they receive the second dose? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid - 19/downloads/covid19 -vaccine -erro rs- deviations.pdf Should a vaccine be repeated if the patient moved during administration and did not receive an entire dose? https://www.cdc.gov/va ccines/covid - 19/downloads/covid19 -vaccine -errors - deviations.pdf What are the next steps if the COVID -19 vaccine was administered after the allowed time from the first vial puncture or administered past the expiration/beyond- use date? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid -19/clinical- considerations/covid -19-vaccines - us.html#Appendix -A If someone has already been diagnosed with COVID -19, do they still need to get the vaccine? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/c ovid -19/clinical - considerations/covid -19-vaccines -us.html#CoV -19- vaccines? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid -19/clinical- considerations/covid -19-vaccines - us.html#Contraindications What are the recommendations regarding approved vaccines for individuals who have a history of anaphylaxis? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid -19/info-by- product/pfizer/anaphylaxis -management.html Are there additional clinical considerations for persons who have previously received passive antibody therapy for COVID - 19? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid -19/clinical - considerations/covid -19-vaccines - us.html#Administration 2 We have a patient who received the Pfizer COVID -19 vaccine within 90 days of receiving passive antib ody therapy for COVID - 19, should they be revaccinated? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid -19/clinical- considerations/covid -19-vaccines - us.html#Administration Can immunocompromised https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid -19/clinical- considerations/covid -19-vaccines - us.html#underlying -conditions Is a consent form required for individuals to sign in order to receive the vaccine? https://www.tn.gov/health/cedep/ncov/covid -19- vaccine -information -for-healthcare -providers.html Will Vaccine Information Statements (VIS) be available at the time of vaccine administration? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid - 19/eua/index.html Is there any post -vaccination guidance regarding what employers should do if someone develops potential COVID -19 symptoms? .https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019 - ncov/hcp/post -vaccine -considerations -healthcare - personnel.html What do we do if we cannot get 6 full doses from the Pfizer vial? Can we combine vials? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/admin/storage/ index.html Is there a protocol for what to do if there are unused doses at the end of the day? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/admin/storage/ index.html Is there a need for volunteers to serve at vaccination sites? Specifically, is there a need for RNs to assist with vaccinations for county health departments? https://www.tn.gov/health/cedep/ncov/help - out.html If an employee/patient cannot receive the 2nd dose of vaccine at the correct time, how many days after can the dose be given? patient received the Pfizer COVID -19 vaccine for their first dose and received the Moderna COVID -19 vaccine for their second dose, do they need to receive another vaccine? after receiving the COVID -19 vaccine should someone wait to get the pneumonia vaccination, shingles vaccination, or other types of vaccines? https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019 - ncov/vaccines/expect.html A patient received the COVID -19 vaccine within 14 days of another vaccine. Does either of the vaccines need to be repeated? https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019 - ncov/vaccines/expect.html If 0.9% sodium chloride was administered without the Pfizer COVID -19 vaccine, can the patient be vaccinated? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid - 19/downloads/covid19 -vaccine -errors - deviations.pdf If the Pfizer COVID -19 vaccine was administered without the sodium chloride, should the patient be revaccinated? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid - 19/downloads/covid19 -vacc ine-errors - deviations.pdf 3 If the Pfizer COVID -19 vaccine was diluted with the wrong diluent, should the patient be revaccinated? https://www.cdc.gov/v accines/covid - 19/downloads/covid19 -vaccine -errors - deviations.pdf Is anything known about the possibility of reactivation of Bell's palsy after receipt of the Moderna vaccine? https://www.cdc.gov/coron avirus/2019 - ncov/vaccines/recommendations/underlying- conditions.html Is information about vaccine side effects being updated on the CDC website using V -safe responses? Is there a place to read this information on reported side effects online? https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019 - ncov/vaccines/safety/vsafe.html Is there a plan for getting vaccines to older adults in the community who do not have transportation? https://tnhra.org/services/transportation/ Can we vaccinate out of state residence? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid - 19/vaccination -provider -support.html If someone has a history of severe reactions to prior vaccinations without known etiology, d o you advise they still get the vaccine? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid - 19/downloads/covid19 -vaccine -errors -19/clinical- considerations/covid -19-vaccines -us.html#pregnant Are pharmacies administering COVID vaccine taking appointments or walk -ins? Who can they vaccinate? https://covid19.tn.gov/covid -19-community - phar information? What -19/long -term - care/pharmacy -partnerships.html Is there any on LTCF residents with immunocompromised conditions receiving vaccine? https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019 - Other -19/long -term - care/pharmacy -partnerships.html How to locate vaccinating facilities in your county? https://vaccinefinder.org/ How register for a Vaccination Appointment https://vaccinate.tn.gov/ Who decides the phases and how the vaccine is distributed? https://www.tn.gov/health/cedep/ncov/covid -19- vaccine -information.html What if individuals arrive for a second dose but don't have their vaccination card/proof of the first dose? https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019 - ncov/vaccines/faq.html If individuals lost their vaccination card, how can they receive a replacement card? https://redcap.health.tn.gov/redcap/surveys/?s=LLJ 83PT4PF Is there a plan are homebound? https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid -19/clinical- considerations/homebound insurance? https://www.hhs.gov/coronavirus/cares -act- provider -relief -fund/index.html https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019 - ncov/vari ants/variant.html?CDC_AA_refVal=https% 3A%2F%2Fwww.cdc.gov%2Fcoronavirus%2F2019- ncov%2Ftransmission%2Fvariant.html 4 Where do I find the level of community transmission in my community? https://covid.cdc.gov/covid -data - tracker/#vaccinations -county -view Where do I find vaccine cov erage rates and what is considered high and low vaccination rates? https://covid.cdc.gov/covid -data - tracker/#vaccinations -county -view Where
